title: Amang’ana aga Coronavirus
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

14.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

29.sxb: Enyende eno eilanzia ne entone/ amatone ezia amate aga

30.sxb: Enyende eno eilanzia ne entone/ amatone ezia amate aga

31.sxb: Weera ale. Owuliire owua emiita iwiri  wuuza okukuta ale kugere amatone amakate-kaate aga amate gareke okukutuukako
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

32.sxb: Weera ale. Owuliire owua emiita iwiri  wuuza okukuta ale kugere amatone amakate-kaate aga amate gareke okukutuukako
32.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

39.sxb: Kutio no owuine omuntu  na akolola/nari omulwire/aisiamula mbwe:
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.sxb: Kutio no owuine omuntu  na akolola/nari omulwire/aisiamula mbwe:
40.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

41.sxb: Wa-ee ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa. Awantu waesa okukolola namba okuisiamula mu ekintu ekio ni ngawaesa  okulanzizia awandi owulwire owuo yaaya.
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

42.sxb: Wa-ee ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa. Awantu waesa okukolola namba okuisiamula mu ekintu ekio ni ngawaesa  okulanzizia awandi owulwire owuo yaaya.
42.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

49.sxb: Andi omuntu ono ngari omulwire yaaya, ni airinda kugere atatuukra owulwire
49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.sxb: Andi omuntu ono ngari omulwire yaaya, ni airinda kugere atatuukra owulwire
50.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

51.sxb: Awantu awalwire waesa okuwula ne ewilago ewilagana mbwe wari no owulwire, ni wakiaesa okulanzia owulwire
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.sxb: Awantu awalwire waesa okuwula ne ewilago ewilagana mbwe wari no owulwire, ni wakiaesa okulanzia owulwire
52.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

53.sxb: Owukirre wiona, ne ekintu ekilootu no omuntu aweere ale no omuganda ogwa awantu, aeniki ngoesa waamanya omuntu omulwire agati yaawu ao.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

54.sxb: Owukirre wiona, ne ekintu ekilootu no omuntu aweere ale no omuganda ogwa awantu, aeniki ngoesa waamanya omuntu omulwire agati yaawu ao.
54.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

61.sxb: Ewintu ewisinyiriziwua kugere  elifiti eginga awantu eniine namba eike

62.sxb: Ewintu ewisinyiriziwua kugere  elifiti eginga awantu eniine namba eike

69.sxb: Enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa
69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

70.sxb: Enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa
70.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

71.sxb: Ewintu ewiambwako no oniina ku egoroofa

72.sxb: Ewintu ewiambwako no oniina ku egoroofa

81.sxb: Kukawa kutio, enyinga zindi amate aga omulwire gaesa okutoonya ku ewintu windi kiomo….
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

82.sxb: Kukawa kutio, enyinga zindi amate aga omulwire gaesa okutoonya ku ewintu windi kiomo….
82.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

83.sxb: No owulwire wuno wuuza wuawamba mwona

84.sxb: No owulwire wuno wuuza wuawamba mwona

89.sxb: No oizukirre oambe ku ewintu wino nikuemao oambe ekieni kiao,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.sxb: No oizukirre oambe ku ewintu wino nikuemao oambe ekieni kiao,
90.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

91.sxb: Kandi engira endala endootu eya oesa okumala nayo enyende zino ni, no ozioziizie ne esabuuni, ekintu ekifumia ikwe namba amanzi agazoganiiwue na amalwa
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.sxb: Kandi engira endala endootu eya oesa okumala nayo enyende zino ni, no ozioziizie ne esabuuni, ekintu ekifumia ikwe namba amanzi agazoganiiwue na amalwa
92.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

93.sxb: Enyende zino ziesa okuwa endamu  ku enyinga ezisugire
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

94.sxb: Enyende zino ziesa okuwa endamu  ku enyinga ezisugire
94.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

99.sxb: Ekio nikio ekigera ni kuri kulootu okulonda
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.sxb: Ekio nikio ekigera ni kuri kulootu okulonda
100.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

101.en: wash with soap up to here

102.en: wash with soap up to here

107.sxb: Ota-amba ku ekieni kiao. (Namba ekieni ekia omwina waao.) Ni, ni kuri mbwe paka owiambeko, ni sooka oisaawe geeza ino ne esabuuni
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.sxb: Ota-amba ku ekieni kiao. (Namba ekieni ekia omwina waao.) Ni, ni kuri mbwe paka owiambeko, ni sooka oisaawe geeza ino ne esabuuni
108.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

109.sxb: okuemba olwembo olwa ‘Happy Birthday” kawiri kutoola esekendi amakumi awiri ago
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

110.sxb: okuemba olwembo olwa ‘Happy Birthday” kawiri kutoola esekendi amakumi awiri ago
110.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

117.sxb: No okuozia enze eya amakono gaao
117.en: wash the back of your hands

118.sxb: No okuozia enze eya amakono gaao
118.en: wash the back of your hands

121.sxb: Ni no okiambireko, no omwoyo gwao gutainyaasia yaaya. Ni toola esabuuni oisaawe nayo.
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.sxb: Ni no okiambireko, no omwoyo gwao gutainyaasia yaaya. Ni toola esabuuni oisaawe nayo.
122.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

123.sxb: Lwona ni kuesekana ota-amba enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa ekio.
123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

124.sxb: Lwona ni kuesekana ota-amba enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa ekio.
124.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

127.sxb: No oiwooye ekintu ekio ku amiire amangi, enyende zimenya munsi yakio
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.sxb: No oiwooye ekintu ekio ku amiire amangi, enyende zimenya munsi yakio
128.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

129.sxb: No omiire okukola ne ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa, kirigize ale. Kola ni kilala owuire ki owuire.
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

130.sxb: No omiire okukola ne ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa, kirigize ale. Kola ni kilala owuire ki owuire.
130.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

131.sxb: Muiwule ne ekijiiko ekia okuiwula ewiokuria

132.sxb: Muiwule ne ekijiiko ekia okuiwula ewiokuria

139.sxb: Omuntu ki omuntu awe ne etawulo yaae

140.sxb: Omuntu ki omuntu awe ne etawulo yaae

141.sxb: Mutasangirizia ewiokuria, endaawo, ewinyweero no etawulo ezia okuieya
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.sxb: Mutasangirizia ewiokuria, endaawo, ewinyweero no etawulo ezia okuieya
142.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

145.sxb: Nikuesekana igulao kandi oigaleo ekiriango ne enkumbo namba ni iwega riao.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

146.sxb: Nikuesekana igulao kandi oigaleo ekiriango ne enkumbo namba ni iwega riao.
146.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

149.en: and after being out in the public

150.en: and after being out in the public

153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

154.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

165.sxb: Soma amang’ana agajojerwe gano kugere owe no okumanya okungi.
165.en: Read the articles for more tips!

196.en: Otagalusia amang’ana agagambregambrweko ano, ni oesa waagagalusia mu omunwa gundi namba oesa waagata mu engira indi nikuemao waagaesania ku awantu wusaasa aa otaagalamo amasendi. Otagalusia eriina eria omujoji owajoja amang’ana gano kandi omusaati owasaata ewiiruuzia wino oetwa mbwe Weiman Kou.
